author: Al Jazeera
title: China failed to warn public of coronavirus threat for days: AP
description: Officials delayed announcement for six days allowing over 3,000 new cases to emerge, according to internal documents.
content: In the six days after top Chinese officials secretly determined they were probably facing a pandemic from the new coronavirus, the city of Wuhan hosted a mass banquet for tens of thousands of people and millions began their annual trip home for the Lunar New … [+5910 chars]
